  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Lead Consulting Civil Engineer",
  "description": "Independent Project Monitoring Company Limited (IPMC) is one of Nigeria oilfield service companies providing innovative solutions, technology, and services to the oil and gas industry. The Company operates in Nigeria and has a network of, manufacturing, service, research and development, and training facilities.
It delivers innovative technologies and services designed to meet the world&#39;s current and future energy needs in a safe, ethical, and sustainable manner. Grounded by our core values and inspired by our world-class people, we are committed to being a trusted business partner to those we serve.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Lead Consulting Civil Engineer&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full Time

Job Summary


	The Civil Lead Consulting Engineer provides expert leadership and technical direction in the design, planning, and execution of civil and structural engineering projects.
	This role oversees multiple consulting assignments &mdash; including infrastructure, building, and construction projects &mdash; ensuring all designs and implementations meet client requirements, industry standards, and regulatory specifications.
	The ideal candidate combines strong technical knowledge with project management expertise and leadership ability.


Key Responsibilities
Project Leadership &amp; Management:


	Lead and manage civil and structural engineering projects from concept to completion.
	Define project scope, technical specifications, timelines, and budgets.
	Supervise and review detailed engineering designs, drawings, and documentation.
	Ensure effective coordination with multidisciplinary teams (mechanical, electrical, and architectural).
	Oversee project execution, monitoring progress, risks, and deliverables.


Technical Design &amp; Consultancy:


	Provide expert consultancy in structural design, foundation engineering, and construction supervision.
	Prepare and review designs for buildings, bridges, roads, drainage, and other civil infrastructure.
	Conduct geotechnical, hydrological, and structural analysis for proposed projects.
	Ensure compliance with relevant standards (BS, ACI, ASCE, Eurocode, or local codes).
	Approve drawings, calculations, BOQs, and technical reports before submission.


Quality Assurance &amp; Compliance:


	Enforce quality assurance and quality control (QA/QC) procedures at all stages of design and construction.
	Ensure all works comply with health, safety, and environmental standards.
	Review and approve contractor submittals, shop drawings, and materials.
	Conduct site inspections, structural integrity assessments, and audits.


Client &amp; Stakeholder Management:


	Serve as the primary technical advisor and liaison between the company, clients, and contractors.
	Provide professional recommendations and technical presentations to clients and management.
	Support bid preparation, proposal writing, and business development activities.
	Build and maintain strong client relationships through professional service delivery.


Leadership &amp; Mentorship:


	Lead and mentor junior civil engineers, drafters, and site supervisors.
	Promote knowledge sharing, technical excellence, and innovation within the team.
	Conduct regular training and performance evaluations for project staff.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Quality and accuracy of design and technical deliverables.
	On-time and within-budget project delivery.
	Client satisfaction and retention rate.
	Compliance with engineering codes and safety standards.
	Team performance and knowledge development.


Qualifications &amp; Requirements
Education:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Civil or Structural Engineering.
	Master&rsquo;s degree in Structural Engineering or Engineering Management is an advantage.


Certifications:


	NSE, COREN registration preferred.
	Certified Lead Auditor in ISO 9001 is required (additional certifications in ISO 14001, ISO 45001, or API Q1/Q2 are a plus).
	Project Management certification (PMP/PRINCE2) is an added advantage.
	HSE Certification (Level 1&ndash;3) is an advantage.


Experience:


	Minimum of 12 years of relevant experience in civil and structural engineering consulting.
	Proven experience in infrastructure design, structural analysis, and project supervision.
	Experience working on commercial, industrial, and public sector projects.


Skills &amp; Competencies:


	Proficiency in AutoCAD Civil 3D, STAAD Pro, Revit, or similar design software.
	Strong analytical, structural design, and problem-solving skills.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and report-writing skills.
	Sound knowledge of construction methods, standards, and project management principles.
	Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@ipmc-ng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

title: Job Openings at Lacoco
content:
Lacoco - We are a beverage company that produces one of the best liqueur, that is best for all taste buds. We are expanding our brand presence and seeking passionate individuals who wants to grow with us. If you are motivated, customer-focused, and excited to represent a stylish, fast-growing brand, We offer the perfect opportunity. Become part of a team that values innovation, quality, and unforgettable experiences

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Maintenance / Mechanical Technician

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Equipment Maintenance & Repairs:
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Perform routine preventive maintenance on production machines (e.g., mixers, bottling lines, conveyors, pumps, boilers, chillers).
	Diagnose mechanical, electrical, pneumatic, and hydraulic faults and carry out repairs.
	Ensure all equipment operates at optimal performance to avoid downtime.
	Maintain accurate maintenance logs, reports, and documentation.


Production Support:


	Respond quickly to machine breakdowns during production.
	Calibrate machines and ensure they follow beverage industry standards for safety and hygiene.
	Support installation and commissioning of new equipment.


Facility & Utility Management:


	Maintain facility utilities such as water systems, generators, compressors, HVAC, and electrical panels.
	Ensure compliance with safety regulations, food-safety guidelines and company policies.


Requirements
Education & Certification:


	OND/HND/Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Industrial Maintenance, or related field.
	Technical certifications in mechanics, welding, electrical installation, or mechatronics are an advantage. 


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lacoconig@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Production Manager

Job Location: Lagos 

Responsibilities
Production Planning & Management:


	Develop and implement production schedules to meet customer orders and organizational goals.
	Ensure optimal utilization of manpower, machinery, and materials.
	Monitor production flow and adjust operations to resolve bottlenecks.


Quality Control & Assurance:


	Ensure products meet quality standards and regulatory requirements.
	Work closely with Quality Assurance to investigate deviations, defects, or non-conformities.
	Implement corrective and preventive actions.


Team Leadership & Workforce Management:


	Supervise, mentor, and train production staff across shifts.
	Conduct performance evaluations and ensure proper staffing levels.
	Promote a culture of accountability, teamwork, and continuous improvement.


Safety, Compliance & Maintenance:


	Enforce safety protocols and ensure compliance with regulatory and organizational policies.
	Coordinate with Maintenance for preventive and corrective maintenance schedules.
	Conduct routine inspections of equipment and workstations.


Process Optimization & Cost Management:


	Identify areas for process improvement to increase efficiency and reduce waste.
	Monitor production costs and implement cost-saving initiatives.
	Develop and track KPIs such as OEE, downtime, yield, and productivity.


Reporting & Documentation:


	Maintain accurate reports on production output, downtime, inventory usage, and labor performance.
	Present weekly/monthly production performance reports to management.


Key Requirements
Education & Qualifications:


	Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Industrial Management, Production Technology, Mechanical Engineering, or related field.
	Additional certification in Lean Manufacturing, Six Sigma, or Production Management is a plus.


Technical Skills:


	Strong knowledge of manufacturing processes, production planning, workflows, and resource allocation.


Soft Skills:


	Excellent leadership and people management skills.
	Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
	Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and manage deadlines.


Competencies:


	Operational Excellence
	Continuous Improvement Mindset
	Team Leadership
	Analytical Thinking
	Attention to Detail
	Safety and Compliance Awareness.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: lacoconig@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Bottle Blowing Machine Operator

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Machine Operation:


	Set up, operate, and monitor the bottle blowing machine to produce PET bottles in the required size and specifications.
	Adjust machine settings (temperature, air pressure, stretch/blow cycles) for optimal performance.
	Load preforms into the machine and manage bottle output.
	Inspect bottles for defects (thickness, shape, clarity, leaks) and ensure they meet quality standards.


Quality Control:


	Conduct visual and physical quality checks at regular intervals.
	Remove defective products and report recurring issues.
	Record production data, including output quantity, rejects, and adjustments made.


Maintenance & Troubleshooting;


	Perform basic preventive maintenance such as cleaning, lubrication, and minor mechanical adjustments.
	Quickly troubleshoot mechanical or operational issues to avoid production downtime.
	Report major faults to the maintenance team or supervisor for immediate attention.


Safety & Compliance:


	Follow all safety rules, SOPs, and machine-handling procedures.
	Maintain strict hygiene according to food and beverage manufacturing standards
	Ensure the work area is clean, organized, and free of hazards.


Collaboration:


	Work closely with the production team, quality control, and maintenance technicians.
	Communicate machine performance, production targets, and issues to the supervisor.


Requirements
Education:


	SSCE / OND / Technical School Certificate in Mechanical Engineering, Mechatronics, or related field (preferred).


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lacoconig@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

4.) Human Resource Officer

Job Location: Lagos 

Description


	We are seeking a dedicated and highly organized Human Resources Officer to join our growing team.
	The ideal candidate will support the full spectrum of HR functions, including recruitment, onboarding, staff relations, performance management, training, and policy compliance.
	The HR Officer will play a key role in building a positive workplace culture, ensuring smooth HR operations, and supporting both employees and management.
	This is an exciting opportunity for an individual who is passionate about people, processes, and creating an efficient work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: lacoconig@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
